Pre-Game Insights: India and Afghanistan are set to play a three-match T20I series from 11 to 17 January 2024.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will make a comeback in the T20 series against Afghanistan after a hiatus of nearly 14 months.
This will be India's last T20I series before the forthcoming T20 World Cup 2024.
Rohit Sharma will lead the Indian team in the series against Afghanistan.
KL Rahul has been left out of the squad.
Hardik Pandya and Suryakumar Yadav will not be participating in the T20I series against Afghanistan due to injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The India vs Afghanistan T20I series will start on 11 January 2024 and end on 17 January 2024.
The first T20I will be held on 11 January 2024 at Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium, Mohali at 7 pm.
The second T20I will be held on 14 January 2024 at Holkar Cricket Stadium, Indore at 7 pm.
The third T20I will be held on 17 January 2024 at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru at 7 pm.
The India vs Afghanistan T20I series 2024 will be live streamed on JioCinema app and website in India.
The India vs Afghanistan T20I series 2024 will be live telecasted on Sports 18 Network.
